console.log('Hello Content');var colorPalette="";var region="";// get color setting from localstorage
if(localStorage.getItem("colorPalette")!=null){colorPalette=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("colorPalette"));}// https://us-west-2.console.aws.amazon.com/console/home?region=us-west-2
function getRegion(){var region_url=document.getElementById("nav-home-link").href;var regex=/(\w{2}-\w*-\w)/g;region=region_url.match(regex)[0];}//
function changeRegionBackgroundColor(){var color=colorPalette[region];console.log(color);var aws_navbar=document.getElementsByClassName("globalNav-032");for(var i=0;i<aws_navbar.length;i++){aws_navbar[i].style.setProperty('background-color',color,'important');}}getRegion();changeRegionBackgroundColor();
